aiBrief.aiPrompt: A cheerful, modern robot mascot, possibly metallic blue and white, giving a friendly thumbs-up gesture. The background should be clean and bright white or light gray, professional studio lighting, shallow depth of field.

A professional portrait of a middle-aged man named John Doe, identified as representing 'JD Roofing'. He is smiling confidently in front of a residential or construction background. Cinematic thumbnail aspect ratio (3:2).

A portrait of a friendly, middle-aged tradesman named Mike Smith from 'Smith Electric'. He should be standing near electrical equipment or a service van, looking directly at the camera with a warm smile. 3:2 aspect ratio.

A vibrant, high-quality headshot of Carlos Garcia, a man representing 'Garcia Landscaping'. He should be outdoors, possibly standing proudly in a lush, well-manicured garden or next to heavy equipment. Strong sunlight, 3:2 ratio.

A professional, engaging portrait of David Chen, owner of 'Chen's Plumbing'. He should be wearing professional work attire, perhaps with a subtle hint of plumbing tools in the background. Clear, focused shot, 3:2 aspect ratio.

A dark, moody, yet inspiring visual montage representing building an empire and stopping chaos. Could feature abstract geometric shapes converging or a single spotlight on a structured foundation. Dramatic, cinematic lighting.
A collection of five small, circular profile pictures arranged neatly, representing a diverse team. The images should be professional headshots with clean backgrounds, soft studio lighting.
